section.title: Enabling the Console
section.p:
The RabbitMQ Admin Console is off by default in . You can turn on the console by following these steps:
Log in to the lifecycle manager.
Edit the ~/config/rabbitmq/main.yml file for rabbitmq and under the rabbit_plugins:line, uncomment - rabbitmq_management
Commit your configuration to the local git repo, as follows: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "Enabled RabbitMQ Admin Console"
Run the configuration processor: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
Update your deployment directory: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml
Run the RabbitMQ reconfigure playbook to deploy the changes: cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts rabbitmq-reconfigure.yml
To turn the RabbitMQ Admin Console off again, add the comment back and repeat steps 3 through 6.
